completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects of color C to a different color, alternating between R and B.

Recolor all objects to color B, and then recolor objects of color C to color R

Recolor objects of color C to color B and neighbors of the original C objects to color R.
Recolor all objects of color C to color B and all objects of color O to color R
Recolor all objects of size 5 with inner color B and outer color R
Change the color of all objects from color C to B and from color O to R.
Recolor all objects of color C to color B and R based on their new position.
Recolor all objects of color C to B and R.
Recolor objects of color C to B, and recolor objects of color B to R.
Recolor all objects of color C to color B, and then recolor all objects of color C to color R.
Recolor all objects of color C to blue if their column is in an odd position, otherwise recolor them to red.
Recolor all objects of color C to color B, and then recolor all objects of color R to color B.
Change the color of all objects from C to B, then change the color of all objects from B to R.
Recolor all objects of color C to color B, and all other objects to color R
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) C))
        (apply (update_color B))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (not (color_equals (color_of this) C)))
        (apply (update_color R))
    )
)
